columns.name: id
columns.description: An unique identifier for the assessment.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the assessment.

columns.name: compliance_type
columns.description: The name of the compliance standard related to the assessment.

columns.name: assessment_report_destination
columns.description: The destination of the assessment report.

columns.name: assessment_report_destination_type
columns.description: The destination type, such as Amazon S3.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: Specifies when the assessment was created.

columns.name: last_updated
columns.description: The time of the most recent update.

columns.name: aws_account
columns.description: The AWS account associated with the assessment.

columns.name: delegations
columns.description: The delegations associated with the assessment.

columns.name: framework
columns.description: The framework from which the assessment was created.

columns.name: scope
columns.description: The wrapper of AWS accounts and services in scope for the assessment.

columns.name: roles
columns.description: The roles associated with the assessment.
